Html:
All tests are done by creating Excel 5-files.

Size
Proportionality: If I place an image it’s not resized proportional even if setResizeProportional is set true. I get a height like 68% and a width like 79% in Excel (or 61% & 70% or 62% & 71%).
Resizing: Resizing of an image is not possible if the original image is smaller than the size in setHeight, setWidth or setWidthAndHeight. The height will be extremely scaled.

Vertical Positioning
Goal: Image at the footer of a Sheet.
Problem: Excel5Writer can’t process images in header/footer

Test 1:
Image in A1 + setOffsetY
Result: The vertical offset command has no effect at all.

Test 2:
Large mostly transparent image in A1
Result: Visible image. But it’s height differs through different worksheets because (??) of different row heights (different content with text wrap) used between A1 and the bottom of the image.
Are images attached to more cells than the one they’re binded (setCoordinates) to?

Thanks

Fritz
Will look into these matters later this week.
